components.name: banner
components.headline: We are a data analytics startup
components.heading: Knowledge drives transformation
components.html: We use machine learning and knowledge graphs with open banking, so that banks, lenders and fintechs can offer better scoring and lending services to consumers and SMEs.

components.name: imageText
components.headline: _ Open banking
components.heading: Transform your lending and scoring with Open Banking
components.html: Financial institutions have just started to scratch the surface of Open Banking with the development of account aggregation applications. We believe that the next stage for Open Banking is Credit Scoring and Income Verification. It will be a challenging journey of building trust. We are here to help you incorporate them with your current processes.

cards.headline: Credit scoring
cards.heading: Achieve higher acceptance rates and fewer bad loans, harnessing Open Banking data.

cards.headline: Lending
cards.heading: Improve your KYC and AML processes and reduce your operational costs.

cards.headline: Knowledge graphs
cards.heading: Break down data silos across your organisation and generate enterprise knowledge

cards.headline: AI and Machine Learning
cards.heading: Easily implement AI initiatives within your company and introduce digital assistants

cards.headline: Open Banking
cards.heading: Discover new opportunities for your lending business and transform your current processes.
